item.title: Fragments of Remembrance
item.description: The image above leads to an external website. Please be careful! Week 13: Look At Me. This art was lovingly created using: procreate. Artist’s Notes this is a comic I made with my friends a couple months ago currently we are working on episode 2 after a hiatus and I hope you enjoy the first episode. I put a lot of heart into it and I hope to become a WEBTOON original one day https://www.
